org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2

Interface ITransformationStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Conditional, DoWhileLoop, ForEachLoop, ForLoop, Parallel, Sequence, TransformationStep, WhileLoop

    public interface ITransformationStep
    Interface, which represents a step in a transformation chain. These transformation steps can contain various batch natured functionalities.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      If the transformation step contains any resources that need to be disposed of, it can be done here.
      void execute()
      Defines the added functionality of the ITransformationStep object
      void initialize(org.eclipse.emf.mwe2.runtime.workflow.IWorkflowContext ctx)
      In this method the transformation step can be initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(org.eclipse.emf.mwe2.runtime.workflow.IWorkflowContext ctx)
        In this method the transformation step can be initialized. The workflow context is handed to the transformation step
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context of the workflow, which can contain various workflow-specific resources.

      • execute

        void execute()
        Defines the added functionality of the ITransformationStep object

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        If the transformation step contains any resources that need to be disposed of, it can be done here.
